run_workflow.description: Run a workflow from your MindStudio app and start a thread.

props.name: workflow
props.description: Workflow name to run (without the .flow extension).

props.name: variables
props.description: Key-value variables passed to the app.

props.name: callbackUrl
props.description: URL to receive the execution result asynchronously.

props.description: Return the billing cost in the response.
